title: Provides for the transfer of funds for use by the director of the office for the aging for geriatric education centers
summary: Provides for the yearly transfer of funds in an amount of up to one million dollars for use by the director of the office for the aging for services and expenses of the Finger Lakes Geriatric Education Center, the Consortium of New York Geriatric Care Centers, and the Long Island Geriatric Education Center.
